document_data.mainbody:
Hylei Shadowhand, and her sister Kylei Shadowhand, were members of the Sisters of the Blood Moon in the early 14 century DR.
Hylei was an adventuring illusionist who was as proficient in arcana as she was in stealth.
The gnome was armed with a quarterstaff and a sling.
Circa the , the rock gnome twin sisters Hylei and Kylei befriended a half-elven ranger Nevae Quar. Together, the women adventured and and tried to stay out of trouble despite Kylei Shadowhands love of pickpocketing. One fateful night, they came across a site of a goblin ambush in a forest outside Silverymoon. Three fellow adventurers Sferia Ranul, Oaglata, and Nyzeil Nighthammer were fighting for their lives, and the trio of women rushed to help. The group dispatched bandits with natural ease, battling in synch, Sferia became enamored with the new allies battle prowess and convinced them to join her adventuring band - the Sisters of the Blood Moon.
In 1310 DR, Sferia Ranul received a letter â€“ a plea for help from the town of Targos in Icewind Dale. Despite the promise of gold and fame, Sferia led her Sisters to the northern city, answering its pleas for help.
